sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import {storage} from '../firebase'; export default function Login() { return (
); } function uploadPhoto(fileButton, pic, progBar) { console.log('here ----------->'); var fileButton = document.getElementById(fileButton); var pic_1 = document.getElementById(pic); var progBar_1 = document.getElementById(progBar); fileButton.addEventListener('change', function(e) { // Get file if(e.target.files[0]) { console.log('here----->'); var file = e.target.files[0]; console.log(file.name); console.log(file); //const file = e.target.file[0]; // Create storage ref const storageRef = storage.ref('sweet_gifs/' + file.name); // Upload file var task = storageRef.put(file); //pic_1.src = file.name; // Update progress bar task.on('state_changed', function progress(snapshot) { //progBar_1.style.display = 'initial'; var percentage = (snapshot.bytesTransferred / snapshot.totalBytes) * 100; progBar_1.value = percentage; console.log('uploading'); }, function error(err) { console.log(err); }, function complete() { console.log('Completed file upload'); // Load the image for the user storageRef.getDownloadURL().then(function(url) { pic_1.src = url; progBar_1.style.display = 'none'; }).catch(function(error){ console.log(error); }); } ); } else { console.log('file is null'); console.log(e.target.files[0]); } }); }
